descriptions:
["DescriptionLive in a luxuriously furnished property within District One, a lushly landscaped community of well-maintained amenities and an ideal location near to Dubai Downtown and transport links across the whole city.
Ready to move into, fully equipped with appliances and high-end furniture it's a unique offering within D1. In a rare type B layout in the Contemporary villa style, it's a 5 Bedroom property where all the bedrooms come with en-suite bathrooms and walk-in-closets.
The property surrounds a pool area complete with landscaping, with the floor to ceiling windows in all rooms taking in views of the outside space. There is also a covered garage, BBQ area and space surrounding the home ideal for entertaining and for children to play safely.
Internally everything is bright and modern and furnished with top quality items from The One, Marina Exotics and West Elm. There is also specially imported furniture including mango and teal wooden pieces.
The presentation kitchen coupled with a formal dining area is a perfect space for entertainment and the downstairs also contains a family lounge and dining space along with a fantastic formal lounge with a double-height ceiling.
Of course, for a property this size, there is lodging for staff accounted for as well to run the back of the house."]

descriptions: ['DescriptionTreo Homes are proud to present this five bedroom family villa in the well sought after Green Community West, DIP..With a built up area of 6,210 sq,ft and a plot size of 8,637 this is the best price per sq.ft in comparison to any other villa community. The property is located on a quiet cul de sac with the community pool just a stone throw away.\xa0Each bedroom has an attached bathroom and fully fitted wardrobes. The property also has a separate outside maids house to keep the utmost privacy to all the family. The villa has a landscaped garden and a private double garage with electric doors.This property is currently rented until December 2019 and can be sold vacant.- Five en-suite Bedrooms- External Maids room- Quiet cul-de-sac- Very close to Pool- Close to gate- Mature landscaped garden- Tenanted until December 2019Company name: Treo HomesRERA ORN: Address: Office 19C6, I-rise, Barsha Heights, Dubai, UAE Office phone no: +97150814593Primary email: info@treo-homes.com']

descriptions: ['DescriptionTreo Homes are pleased to bring to the market this exquisite Type G, 4 bedroom + Maids town house in\xa0Mira Oasis, Reem.Anchored by a sweeping central park, Reems common areas will feature fountains as well as a centerpiece water feature. A residents club, restaurants and cafes, nurseries and primary schools, dedicated jogging and bicycle paths, a cricket pitch and several football fields, a miniature golf course, and an amphitheater outdoor cinema are all set within the neighborhoodAll Mira Oasis homes have spacious balconies, modern fittings and fixtures, driveways and courtyards.
